column4: hey guys i'm running into a strange problem - i have a relatively fresh install of ubuntu - never had this problem until last night - but now when i try to issue a command using 'sudo' it tells me that my user name is no in the sudoers file - i can issue 'su' and login as root still - but this only happen when i use sudo - ideas on a quicky fix?
su to root and run `visudo` to fix it
